overview: Regular guy, Mike, mistakenly receives a package from a crew member of notorious drug dealer, Big Black, while at work. With his best friend, JD, by his side, the the two must figure what to do: return the package or sell it themselves. With a child to look after and provide for, what should be a simple decision, turns out to be a lot more complicated.
tagline: A day NOBODY will ever forget.
title: The Drop Spot
